name: Dark Theme for Google Translate [V1.0.8]
description: A dark theme for Google Translate! If you like the style or want to report bugs, please send feedback down below! My other Google dark themes: Dark Theme for Google Docs Google Search Dark Theme

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.0.8
The profile chooser is fully dark again.

Version 1.0.7
The style should now work on all Translate domains!
The profile chooser is fully dark again.
The top and side bar are dark again.

Version 1.0.6
translate.google.cn and translate.google.nl are now also dark.
The sidebar is dark again.
The logo text is white again.
The profile chooser is fully dark again.

Version 1.0.5
The logo text is white again.
Notifications in the bottom right are now dark.

Version 1.0.4
The logo text is white again.

Version 1.0.3
Propositions before example words are now readable.
Example sentences are now readable.
The Synonym text is now readable.
The pronunciation in the translated box is now white.
The individual word box is now dark.
The app launcher is dark again.

Version 1.0.2
The Switch to Chrome box is now fully dark.

Version 1.0.1
The Translate info pages are fixed.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
